title: The Kapil Sharma Show' Bua aka Upasana Singh to host Nach Baliye 8 - Times of India
text: Karan puts on hold ‘Koffee’ episode with Kapil Sharma The Kapil Sharma Show' Bua aka Upasana Singh to host Nach Baliye 8 The 8th edition of Nach Baliye is currently on the floor. Nach Baliye has always been one of the most anticipated reality show as the audience gets to see their favorite celebrity couples go head to head in a dance face-off. TNN | Updated: Feb 22, 2017, 06.26 PM IST The 8th edition of Nach Baliye is currently on the floor. Nach Baliye has always been one of the most anticipated reality show as the audience gets to see their favorite celebrity couples go head to head in a dance face-off. As per reports, actress Upasana Singh has been approached for hosting the show. Upasana is remembered for her role of Bua from Comedy Nights With Kapil and The Kapil Sharma Show. READ ALSO: Upasna Singh: I didn’t enjoy my character in Kapil Sharma’s show The actress was keen on hosting the show and she spoke to the team of the show about how she wanted to take up the show. The makers brought her on board as her wit and humor will make the show even more entertaining. In conversation with a popular media firm, Upasana said that she has not signed the agreement yet and they are finalizing things at the moment.
